#summary Installation guide
#labels Featured,Phase-Deploy

= Dependencies =

  # [http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp JDK 6 Update xx]
  # [http://tomcat.apache.org/download-60.cgi Tomcat 6.x zipeed core]
  # [http://dev.mysql.com/downloads/mysql/5.1.html#downloads MySQL Server 5.1]
  # [Eclipse 3.4]
  # Optional. [http://subclipse.tigris.org/ Subclipse plugin]
  # Optional. [http://dev.mysql.com/downloads/gui-tools/5.0.html MySQL GUI Tools]

= Installation =
  # Download, unpack/install all dependencies
    * Use UTF8 as default character set for MySql server
  # MySql server configuration:
    * Create new database 'infirmarium'
    * Add new DB user. Username: trunk; Password: trunk.
    * Assign all privileges for user 'trunk' in database 'infirmarium'
  # Checkout project [http://code.google.com/p/infirmarium/source/checkout sources] from svn
  # Add new Tomcat v.6.0 server to Eclipse workspace
  # Import project to Eclipse workspace
  # Configure build path. If needed.
  # Run project on server
  # Goto http://localhost:8080/infirmarium/ and login as admin/admin
